wdi_agriculture_land.title: Agriculture Land Use
wdi_agriculture_land.description: Land area statistics for agricultural activities including arable land, permanent crops, and agricultural land as share of total land area.

wdi_agriculture_production.title: Agriculture Production
wdi_agriculture_production.description: Agricultural production metrics covering crops, cereals, aquaculture, fisheries, and production indices.

wdi_balance_of_payments.title: Balance of Payments
wdi_balance_of_payments.description: International financial flows including current account, capital account, and balance of payments transactions.

wdi_business_environment.title: Business Environment
wdi_business_environment.description: Indicators measuring the regulatory and institutional environment for private sector activity and business operations.

wdi_economic_growth.title: Economic Growth
wdi_economic_growth.description: Annual economic growth rates and growth trends across various economic measures and sectors.

wdi_education_attainment_literacy.title: Education Attainment and Literacy
wdi_education_attainment_literacy.description: Educational achievement levels, literacy rates, and population distribution by completed education levels.

wdi_education_enrollment.title: Education Enrollment
wdi_education_enrollment.description: School enrollment statistics across preprimary, primary, secondary, and tertiary education levels.

wdi_education_quality_expenditure.title: Education Quality and Expenditure
wdi_education_quality_expenditure.description: Education spending, pupil-teacher ratios, teachers, and other quality indicators for education systems.

wdi_employment_by_sector.title: Employment by Sector
wdi_employment_by_sector.description: Employment distribution across agriculture, industry, and services sectors by gender and economic activity.

wdi_energy_consumption.title: Energy Consumption
wdi_energy_consumption.description: Energy use indicators including total consumption, per capita usage, and consumption by energy source.

wdi_energy_production.title: Energy Production
wdi_energy_production.description: Energy production statistics covering electricity generation, renewable energy production, and fossil fuel output.

wdi_environment_emissions.title: Environmental Emissions
wdi_environment_emissions.description: Greenhouse gas emissions, CO2 emissions, and other environmental pollutant indicators by source and sector.

wdi_environment_resources.title: Environmental Resources
wdi_environment_resources.description: Natural resource indicators including freshwater resources, forest coverage, protected areas, and biodiversity measures.

wdi_fertility_mortality.title: Fertility and Mortality
wdi_fertility_mortality.description: Birth rates, death rates, fertility rates, infant mortality, and life expectancy indicators.

wdi_financial_sector_access.title: Financial Sector Access
wdi_financial_sector_access.description: Financial inclusion metrics measuring access to banking, credit, savings, and other financial services.

wdi_financial_sector_markets.title: Financial Sector Markets
wdi_financial_sector_markets.description: Stock market capitalization, trading volumes, bond markets, and other capital market indicators.

wdi_financial_sector_stability.title: Financial Sector Stability
wdi_financial_sector_stability.description: Banking sector soundness indicators, capital adequacy ratios, non-performing loans, and financial stability metrics.

wdi_gdp_national_accounts.title: GDP and National Accounts
wdi_gdp_national_accounts.description: Gross domestic product by expenditure approach, income approach, and national accounts aggregates.

wdi_gdp_per_capita.title: GDP per Capita
wdi_gdp_per_capita.description: GDP per person measures in current and constant prices, PPP-adjusted, and growth rates.

wdi_gender_women_empowerment.title: Gender and Women's Empowerment
wdi_gender_women_empowerment.description: Gender equality indicators covering economic participation, political representation, education gaps, and women's rights.

wdi_governance_rule_of_law.title: Governance and Rule of Law
wdi_governance_rule_of_law.description: Governance quality indicators including corruption control, regulatory quality, government effectiveness, and rule of law.

wdi_health_disease_prevention.title: Health Disease and Prevention
wdi_health_disease_prevention.description: Disease prevalence, immunization coverage, and prevention measures for communicable and non-communicable diseases.

wdi_health_expenditure.title: Health Expenditure
wdi_health_expenditure.description: Healthcare spending as share of GDP, government health expenditure, out-of-pocket spending, and per capita health costs.

wdi_health_nutrition.title: Health and Nutrition
wdi_health_nutrition.description: Malnutrition indicators including stunting, wasting, underweight children, and micronutrient deficiencies.

wdi_health_reproductive.title: Health Reproductive
wdi_health_reproductive.description: Reproductive health indicators including maternal mortality, contraceptive prevalence, and reproductive healthcare access.

wdi_health_services.title: Health Services
wdi_health_services.description: Healthcare infrastructure metrics covering hospitals, physicians, nurses, hospital beds, and health service delivery.

wdi_income_inequality.title: Income Inequality
wdi_income_inequality.description: Income distribution measures including Gini coefficients, income shares by quintile, and wealth concentration.

wdi_inflation_prices.title: Inflation and Prices
wdi_inflation_prices.description: Consumer price indices, inflation rates, GDP deflators, and price level changes.

wdi_infrastructure_transport.title: Infrastructure Transport
wdi_infrastructure_transport.description: Transportation infrastructure including road networks, railways, airports, ports, and freight transport statistics.

wdi_infrastructure_utilities.title: Infrastructure Utilities
wdi_infrastructure_utilities.description: Utility infrastructure covering electricity access, water supply, sanitation facilities, and telecommunications networks.

wdi_labor_force_participation.title: Labor Force Participation
wdi_labor_force_participation.description: Labor force participation rates, employment-to-population ratios, and workforce composition by age and gender.

wdi_migration_refugees.title: Migration and Refugees
wdi_migration_refugees.description: International migration flows, refugee populations, internally displaced persons, and remittance data.

wdi_population_dynamics.title: Population Dynamics
wdi_population_dynamics.description: Total population, population growth rates, age structure, dependency ratios, and urbanization trends.

wdi_poverty_headcount.title: Poverty Headcount
wdi_poverty_headcount.description: Poverty rates measured at international poverty lines and national poverty thresholds across income levels.

wdi_ppp_economics.title: PPP Economics
wdi_ppp_economics.description: Purchasing power parity conversion factors, price level indices, and PPP-adjusted economic measures.

wdi_public_debt.title: Public Debt
wdi_public_debt.description: Government debt levels, debt-to-GDP ratios, external debt, and debt service indicators.

wdi_public_finance_expenditure.title: Public Finance Expenditure
wdi_public_finance_expenditure.description: Government spending by function including education, health, defense, and social protection expenditures.

wdi_public_finance_revenue.title: Public Finance Revenue
wdi_public_finance_revenue.description: Government revenue sources including tax revenues, non-tax revenues, and grants as shares of GDP.

wdi_social_protection_safety_nets.title: Social Protection and Safety Nets
wdi_social_protection_safety_nets.description: Social assistance programs, unemployment benefits, pension coverage, and safety net program statistics.

wdi_technology_ict_usage.title: Technology ICT Usage
wdi_technology_ict_usage.description: Information and communication technology indicators including internet penetration, mobile subscriptions, and broadband access.

wdi_technology_innovation_rd.title: Technology Innovation and R&D
wdi_technology_innovation_rd.description: Research and development expenditure, patent applications, scientific publications, and innovation capacity measures.

wdi_trade_merchandise_exports.title: Trade Merchandise Exports
wdi_trade_merchandise_exports.description: Merchandise export values, composition by product category, and export concentration measures.

wdi_trade_merchandise_imports.title: Trade Merchandise Imports
wdi_trade_merchandise_imports.description: Merchandise import values, composition by product category, and import dependency indicators.

wdi_trade_services.title: Trade Services
wdi_trade_services.description: Service trade statistics including travel, transport, financial services, and other commercial service exports and imports.

wdi_unemployment_youth.title: Unemployment Youth
wdi_unemployment_youth.description: Youth unemployment rates for ages 15-24, NEET rates, and youth labor market indicators by gender.
